title: Off We Go!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Hey, hey! Is everyone here~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Wait a sec! Sliding in saaaafe! I’m safe, right, Kanan-senpai!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’ll count it as safe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yes!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>How can you always show up at the last minute like this!? If you’re late, you get 3 extra kilometers of running, you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby got here 30 minutes early because she was scared.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>But I didn’t want to show up with bedhead!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You can get more than 3 extra kilometers!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>The way you pursue cuteness to that extent... I can’t help but respect it, zura...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Alright, that’s enough chit-chat! I’m about to explain our special combined school practice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>A triathlon from hell, huh...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honoka-chan, shh!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Hell...! I’ll definitely rise out of it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>I’m looking forward to how tough it will be.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>The route is in your phones, right? Make sure to go through all the checkpoints!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>If you cheat, we’ll find out~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You’ll find out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Rina-san created a GPS monitoring system.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>If you try to take a shortcut, an alarm will go off. Rina-chan Board says, “Beep!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Don’t say “beep”!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>This course... I wonder if Kanata-chan will be able to finish it by the end of today...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Pull yourself together, Kanata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>There are things that can and can’t be done with sheer willpower~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Somehow, I’m starting to worry too...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Don’t worry, Ayumu-san! We’ve been practicing hard too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>But being able to worry means you understand your own abilities. Look at our Nico-chan...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>We are absolutely going to be number one!! Absolutely!! Got it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Leave it to Rin, nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Aqours won’t lose either~! Full speed ahead, Yousoro~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>With the leg and body strength I have from training on the beach, this will be a breeze~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Mari-san, let’s stay focused and push ahead!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Nijigaku is obviously going to be number one! Because Lanzhu’s leading it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>The one who’s leading is Kasumin, you know~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hey, when are we heading off? It seems like we’re just going to keep babbling on here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Right, we should get moving soon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Let’s conquer this hell triathlon and power up together!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Alright, let’s go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Let’s depart~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s move~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
